column5: I heard a goofy rumour that we might be allowed 2 rods per person on simcoe? THis isn't true is it? I know it is April fools day but I am not trying to be funny. Any comment?
One rod, 10 rods, it's academic. There are no fish in Simcoe.
April fools   but then again, I have seen MNR do stupid things before  Nan, April fools
that is true.  Did you hear that everybody, there is no fish in Simcoe.  Don't bother fishing Simcoe, all the fish are gone.  That is true
I know it is april fools but I heard this from a very unreliable source.
For a few more days if you can drill a hole Cudz... then back to one..
Yeah I thought so.  The clown probably got ice fishing and softwater fishing mixed up.  I did an internet search and came up empty so I figured I was being duped.
